unit_specific.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

transport_capacity.capacity_text: This model has a transport capacity of 14 Death Guard Infantry models.
transport_capacity.restrictions: Each Terminator model takes up the space of 2 models.

composition_and_wargear.unit_composition: This unit contains 1 Chaos Land Raider.
composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: This model is equipped with: 2 soulshatter lascannons, a twin heavy bolter, and armoured tracks.
wargear_options: This model's twin heavy bolter can be replaced with 1 combi-bolter.
This model can be equipped with 1 havoc launcher.

leader: This unit cannot be led by any Character and cannot lead other units.
